of one sun god, Aton. The bust is at the top of a "wish list" of five major artefacts exhibited abroad that Egypt wants returned as part of its cultural heritage. Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti, Zahi Hawass said in a statement. 2011 3:29 PM Outgoing Google CEO Eric Schmidt is shopping a book entitled Empire of the Mind: The Dawn of the Techno-Political Age. Google Ideas director and author Jared Cohen will collaborate on the book. Crains New York: The pair collaborated on a recent essay in The Digital Disruption.' The book project grew out of the essay, which examines the challenges that technology poses to authoritarian regimes. Literary agent Mel Parker represents the project. According to the article, several publishers are bidding for the work. The auction for it will end on Tuesday. Last week, news broke that Eric Schmidt MEDIABISTRO COURSES
